LanguageData.VBE_DrankSoda.label: drank soda
LanguageData.VBE_DrankSoda.description: A burst of sugar enters the bloodstream, providing some short-lived energy. Provides a 5% manipulation buff for 5 hours.
LanguageData.VBE_DrankTea.label: drank tea
LanguageData.VBE_DrankTea.description: Tannins naturally found in tea once metabolised increases the stimuli in ones nervous system, suppressing ones urge to sleep, as well as boosting ones immune system. Increases immunity gain speed by 15% and provides 10% reduction in rest fall rate for 5 hours.
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaAsIngredient.label: drank tequila based cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaAsIngredient.description: This colonist drank a cocktail that had tequila as one of its ingredients. Provides an animal tame chance bonus of 15%.
LanguageData.VBE_WhiskeyAsIngredient.label: drank whiskey based cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_WhiskeyAsIngredient.description: This colonist drank a cocktail that had whiskey as one of its ingredients. Provides a shooting accuracy bonus.
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaAsIngredient.label: drank vodka based cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaAsIngredient.description: This colonist drank a cocktail that had vodka as one of its ingredients. Increases dodge chance by 20%.
LanguageData.VBE_GinAsIngredient.label: drank gin based cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_GinAsIngredient.description: This colonist drank a cocktail that had gin as one of its ingredients.
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyAsIngredient.label: drank ambrandy based cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyAsIngredient.description: This colonist drank a cocktail that had ambrandy as one of its ingredients.
LanguageData.VBE_RBMeadAsIngredient.label: drank mead based cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_RBMeadAsIngredient.description: This colonist drank a cocktail that had mead as one of its ingredients.
LanguageData.VBE_WineAsIngredient.label: drank wine based cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_WineAsIngredient.description: This colonist drank a cocktail that had wine as one of its ingredients. You monster.
LanguageData.VBE_ConsumedLuciferiumPowder.label: consumed luciferium powder (from meal)
LanguageData.VBE_ConsumedLuciferiumPowder.description: Luciferium powder is a very finely blended powder made from luciferium. So diluted, the drug won't certainly heal any wounds, but it will reinvigorate its consumer considerably.
LanguageData.VBE_ConsumedGoStock.label: consumed go-juice stock (from meal)
LanguageData.VBE_ConsumedGoStock.description: Go-juice stock is a gelatinized cube of Go-Juice, able to be digested rather than injected. So diluted, the drug won't block so much pain, and combat advantages will be much more subtle.
LanguageData.VBE_ConsumedWakeupPowder.label: consumed wake-up powder (from meal)
LanguageData.VBE_ConsumedWakeupPowder.description: Wake-up powder is a crushed and powdered form of wake-up, surprisingly sweet and sometimes used as a replacement for sugar in desserts or dissolved into a morning espresso. So diluted, the drug won't be as stimulating. Note that, while not addictive, wake-up powder still carries risk (albeit very small) of a heart attack.
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyInspiration.label: ambrandy inspiration
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyInspiration.description: Consumed ambrandy. High quality ambrandy will provide an artistic inspiration if the colonist is capable of getting it.
LanguageData.VBE_GinHigh.label: gin high
LanguageData.VBE_GinHigh.description: Drank some gin. Increases social impact.
LanguageData.VBE_GinHigh.stages.0.label: warm
LanguageData.VBE_GinHigh.stages.1.label: tipsy
LanguageData.VBE_GinHigh.stages.2.label: drunk
LanguageData.VBE_GinHigh.stages.3.label: hammered
LanguageData.VBE_GinHigh.stages.4.label: blackout
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaHigh.label: tequila high
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaHigh.description: Drank some tequila. Imbibers of tequila are known to excel at extended combat.
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaHigh.stages.0.label: warm
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaHigh.stages.1.label: tipsy
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaHigh.stages.2.label: drunk
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaHigh.stages.3.label: hammered
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaHigh.stages.4.label: blackout
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaHigh.label: vodka high
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaHigh.description: Drank some vodka. Provides a melee accuracy buff that scales with drunkeness.
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaHigh.stages.0.label: warm
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaHigh.stages.1.label: tipsy
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaHigh.stages.2.label: drunk
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaHigh.stages.3.label: hammered
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaHigh.stages.4.label: blackout
LanguageData.VBE_WhiskeyHigh.label: whiskey high
LanguageData.VBE_WhiskeyHigh.description: Drank some whiskey. Increases global work speed by 15%.
LanguageData.VBE_DoubleWhiskeyHigh.label: double whiskey high
LanguageData.VBE_DoubleWhiskeyHigh.description: Drank some double whiskey. Increases global work speed by 20% and trade pricing by 20%.
LanguageData.VBE_HotCoffeeHigh.label: hot coffee high
LanguageData.VBE_HotCoffeeHigh.description: Caffeine naturally found in coffee once metabolised increases the stimuli in one's nervous system, suppressing ones urge to sleep, as well as clearing ones mind. Increases learning speed by a 15% amount and 15% reduction in rest fall rate. Hot coffee reduces hypothermia, cold reduces heatstroke.
LanguageData.VBE_IcedCoffeeHigh.label: iced coffee high
LanguageData.VBE_IcedCoffeeHigh.description: Caffeine naturally found in coffee once metabolised increases the stimuli in ones nervous system, suppressing ones urge to sleep, as well as clearing ones mind. Increases learning speed by a 15% amount and 15% reduction in rest fall rate. Hot coffee reduces hypothermia, cold reduces heatstroke.
LanguageData.VBE_CaffeineTolerance.label: caffeine tolerance
LanguageData.VBE_CaffeineTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to caffeine. The more severe this tolerance is, the more caffeine it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.VBE_CaffeineAddiction.label: caffeine addiction
LanguageData.VBE_CaffeineAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to caffeine. Long-term presence of caffeine has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug. \nWithout regular doses of caffeine, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.VBE_CaffeineAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
LanguageData.VBE_EnergyDrinkHigh.label: energy drink high
LanguageData.VBE_EnergyDrinkHigh.description: Energy drinks restore rest immediately, and increase moving speed, but at the cost of a later crash.
LanguageData.VBE_EnergyDrinkCrash.label: energy drink crash
LanguageData.VBE_EnergyDrinkCrash.description: An unpleasant delayed after-effect of energy drink consumption.
LanguageData.VBE_ConsumedCocktail.label: consumed cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_ConsumedCocktail.description: Consumed a nice cocktail. Has a chance to provide a random inspiration.
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoHigh.label: tobacco high
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoHigh.description: Nicotine in the bloodstream. Generates a soft feeling of fuzzy well-being.
LanguageData.VBE_DeluxeTobaccoHigh.label: high-quality tobacco high
LanguageData.VBE_DeluxeTobaccoHigh.description: Nicotine in the bloodstream. Generates a soft feeling of fuzzy well-being.
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoTolerance.label: tobacco tolerance
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to tobacco. The more severe this tolerance is, the more tobacco it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoAddiction.label: tobacco dependence
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to tobacco. Long-term use of tobacco has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug. \nWithout regular doses of tobacco, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
LanguageData.VBE_CiderHigh.label: cider high
LanguageData.VBE_CiderHigh.description: Alcohol from cider in the bloodstream. It makes people happy, but reduces capacities. Cannot cause alcohol addiction. Cannot get past the “warm” drunken stage no matter how many are downed.
LanguageData.VBE_CiderHigh.stages.0.label: warm
LanguageData.VBE_CiderAsIngredient.label: drank cider based cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_CiderAsIngredient.description: This colonist drank a cocktail that had cider as one of its ingredients. Many praise cider for its supposed antioxidant properties. Slightly removes toxic buildup.
